descriptionHtml:
Overlooking the majestic Whiterun River is situated atop a stony cliff the Whiterun Valley Hotel Resort. After you pay your monthly Taxes to Cyrodiil, you may purchase a complimentary Key at the Cooking Pot in the lobby. The key will unlock the Guest Suite on the second floor, via the Towers just outside the lobby.  Above this are the Staterooms.  Do visit the Indoor Tepidarium Pool, with hot or cold running waters. Or buy some gifts at the Hotel Gift shop. Dine on Guar Apple Turnovers in the Bistro Cafe, or rummage through our collection of books in the Library. May your stay here in our fabulous Hotel Resort be one of fine memories.  

M7.


- update 2/28/2012: The entrance wall seems to disappear at first, but entering the gate will fix this temporary CK bug.


M7.
author: Morsepone7
